name: quickrun.vim
summary: Run a command and show its result quickly.
description:
*quickrun* is Vim plugin to execute whole/part of editing file and show the result.
It provides :QuickRun command for it.

Default is set in the following languages:

- awk
- bash
- c
- cpp
- dosbatch
- eruby
- go
- groovy
- haskell
- io
- java
- javascript
- llvm
- lua
- ocaml
- perl
- php
- python
- r
- ruby
- scala
- scheme
- sed
- sh
- vim
- zsh

You can add settings for other languages and situations.

Latest Version:
http://github.com/thinca/vim-quickrun
